articles.title: Friday actor Anthony Johnson has died at age 55 - Daily Mail
articles.description: His nephew told TMZ that Anthony had been found passed out in a Los Angeles store earlier this month. He was rushed to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.
articles.content:
